name: Chasers (Alawyds)
description:
GAMEPLAY 0.7 EARLY ACCSESS

Chaser Is A Game Where You Choose Who Chasses You!

The Game Countians Lots Of Funny And Scary Moments 

So Make Sure To Enjoy :)

INPUT
  • Walk = W, A, S, D 
  •  Jump = Spacebar 
  •  Sprint = Left Shift 
  •  Crouch = Left CTRL
No System Reqs For Now Expected Release Date 
  • From 21/08/2022 To 28/08/2022
You Can Pre Order The Game If You Want !
